title: [1.73]宠物小精灵mod
author: klamben
txt_content:
本帖最后由 klamben 于 2011-7-20 12:50 编辑 

去圖~





下載:
需要1.73modloader(沒有的按)
MOD本體:http://u.115.com/file/aq3respy#pokemon_mod.rar
1.73MOD補丁:http://u.115.com/file/e6yoxk2t#
安装：
將jar內的文件放進minecraft.jar內
resources放在.minecraft的目錄
OK~
回複給我力量

replies.author: jimmyzhou727
replies.txt_content: 想知道mod有啥特性，有啥更新

replies.author: klamben
replies.txt_content:
jimmyzhou727 发表于 2011-7-4 13:16 
想知道mod有啥特性，有啥更新
You can make more pokemons, and a single attack for each pokemon/type?
Here they are:
Mewtwo: Extrasensory, mewtwo vibrates, 3 hearts damage, ranged attack.
Dialga: Roar of Time, dialga fires giant purple beam with grey end, 6 hearts damage, ranged attack.
Palkia: Dragon Claw, palkia pulls both arms inwards one after another, 5 hearts damage, direct attack.
Mew: Extrasensory.
Pikachu: Thunderbolt, a lightning hits the player and may paralyze it for 3 seconds, 4 hearts damage, ranged attack.
Pichu: Shock Wave, flashes the player with a yellow flash for 3 seconds and paralyzes it for 3 seconds, 2 hearts damage, range attack.
Raichu: Thunderbolt, many lightnings hit the player and may paralyze it for 6 seconds, 5 hearts damage ranged attack.
When i don't have anything to do i'll just keep writing some more attacks.
会听话的吗？
